rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An object property linking an activity such as a project or endeavour to something that is created or produced as a result of that activity. Examples include a building created as a result of a building project, and a journal article published to describe the results of a research investigation.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Domain and range constraints have been removed from this object property to permit it to be used in unforeseen ways.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has output

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An object property linking something that is created or produced to the activity that created or produced it.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Domain and range constraints have been removed from this object property to permit it to be used in unforeseen ways.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is output of
